turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I need help with an order I placed. The tracking number says it was delivered, but I never received it. This is so frustrating!

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I am very sorry to hear that! I can certainly help you with this. Could you please provide me with your order number so I can look into this for you?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Sure, it's #12345. Also, can you tell me why the estimated delivery date changed three times? I don't understand why it kept getting pushed back.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you. I've reviewed order #12345. It appears the delivery date was adjusted due to unforeseen logistical challenges, including weather conditions and carrier delays. Regarding the missing package, it seems it was marked as delivered near your address. I recommend checking with your neighbors, as sometimes packages get delivered to the wrong address. If the package is still missing after that, we can initiate a claim with the carrier. However, I can't currently explain precisely why the delivery date was pushed back multiple times; the system just notes 'unforeseen circumstances'.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, I'll check with my neighbors. But if the carrier is the problem, and if the delivery date changes, why isn't there better communication about that? This all seems very unorganized. Anyway, thanks for the help.
